text:
I need some suggestions regarding HubSpot Blog RSS
• Suppose whenever I publish blog post to portal 1, I have to add this blog post to another portal. I know this sounds weird but just checking if someone has the idea or did this kind of stuff in past ??
Hey Jaydip, I’ve designed something similar using Zapier for automation, which supports a “New COS Blog Article Published” trigger.
<@U26BLKGE4> Would you mind to share few more details on this ??

Sure, the basic idea is to connect two HS portal to the Zapier account, listen for posts to be published in portal 1, then run a coded action to create and publish a new post in portal 2 via the blog post API. In our example it was actually publishing to multiple blogs within one portal, but for your case you would also likely need a lookup between the two portals for objects with IDs, like author IDs, tag IDs, etc… but those should be pretty easy to factor in
Thanks for the idea….Can we do this using workflow from HubSpot as well ??
Potentially, but again, the key here is the new post trigger which as far as I know is a Zapier exclusive
